Today at Aberdeen Harbour, it's looking fun with 2 ft @ 7s NE and light 6 mph WNW winds. Best conditions are on the push from 08:48 to 15:31. Tomorrow, the swell remains at 2 ft @ 8s, but with fresh 11 mph WNW winds, making it poor across the coast. Day after, Aberdeen Harbour picks up to 3 ft @ 9s with light 6 mph NW winds, offering a better chance for some clean rides. Best: today.
